summary: This mod adds the Dragonbone Smasher from Demon Souls to Skyrim for your Dragon slaying pleasure
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Dragonbone Smasher from Demon Souls to Skyrim. This is as much as I could get done considering how broken most of the tools feel this time around compared to previous Bethesda games. 

Release Version: 0.90
Current Version: 0.95

Fixes in Version: 0.95
-Fixed texture path error which seemed to affect some users. Should errors persist let me know.

A big thanks to Yoshh for helping get the mod this far.

Current Issues: 
Issue 1: The weapon lacks blood decals do to issues i was having with the mesh, I couldnt get it to function properly. If there is anyone out there that can lend assistance on getting blood to apply to the weapon during combat feel free to PM me.
Issue 2: The weapon doesnt have its own mesh in the Inventory, not sure how to solve that again anyone has a fix PM me.

How To Obtain: 
The weapon currently MUST be crafted, and requires 30 Iron Ingots and 5 Dragon Bones. Its a hefty two handed weapon so the materials reflect that.

Weapon Stats:
Dragonbone Smasher vs Deadric Greatsword
Atk Speed:____ 0.5500 vs 0.7000
Base Atk :_________50 vs 24
Weapon Reach:___1.5 vs 1.3

Ask Permission before using these files in your own mods, please and thankyou

- Crazyeyesreaper
author: crazyeyesreaper
